core.vgdl

Class SpriteGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.vgdl.SpriteGroup

  • public class SpriteGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Diego on 18/03/14. This class encapsulates a SpriteGroup: a collection of VGDLSprite objects identified with an unique id. All sprites in the SpriteGroup are of the same type.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteGroup(int itype)
      Creates a new SpriteGroup, specifying the type of sprites this will hold.

      • addAllSprites

        spritesToAdd - Sprites to add.

      • copyAllSprites

        public void copyAllSprites(java.util.Collection<VGDLSprite> spritesToCopy)
        Adds a collection of sprites to this collection. Each sprite added is a copy of the original sprite in the array received.
        Parameters:
        spritesToCopy - Sprites to copy.

      • getSprites

        public java.util.ArrayList<VGDLSprite> getSprites()
        Gets the collection of sprites, as a ConcurrentHashMap [KEY => VALUE].
        Returns:
        the TreeMap with the Sprites.

      • getSpriteIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<VGDLSprite> getSpriteIterator()
        Gets an ordered iterator through all sprites. It will return null if the collection of sprites is empty.
        Returns:
        the list of the sprites in this collection in an iterator.

      • removeSprite

        public void removeSprite(VGDLSprite sprite)
        Removes an sprite.
        Parameters:
        sprite - the sprite to remove.

      • getItype

        public int getItype()
        Gets the type of this SpriteGroup.
        Returns:
        the type of this sprite group

      • getSprite

        public VGDLSprite getSprite(int spriteId)
        Retrieves a sprite given its unique ID. It'll return null if the sprite is not in the collection.
        Parameters:
        spriteId - ID of the sprite to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the desired sprite.

      • getSpriteByIdx

        public VGDLSprite getSpriteByIdx(int idx)
        Retrieves a sprite given its position in the sprite list. Returns null sprite is not in the collection.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of the sprite.
        Returns:
        the desired sprite.

        Clears the collection of sprites.
